summary: Gaming PC website for www.spyderstild.shop showcasing high-end gaming peripherals (mice, keyboards, monitors) and PC builds including a gaming PC (9.3GB) and hacking PC (12.8GB) with a bold, futuristic design
architectural_notes: Product offerings expanded to include complete PC builds
PC builds: Gaming PC (9.3GB), Hacking PC (12.8GB)
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Futuristic PC builds category banner with dark background and red neon accents showing high-performance gaming computers (pc-builds-banner.dim_1200x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage for www.spyderstild.shop that showcases high-end gaming peripherals with sections for mice, keyboards, and monitors
Implement a bold, futuristic visual theme with dark backgrounds, neon accents, sharp geometric shapes, and modern gaming-inspired typography throughout the entire website
Create product showcase sections with visual cards for gaming mice, keyboards, and monitors with placeholder product information
Add navigation header with site branding for Spyderstild and links to product category sections
Generate rendered images of the generated hero background, product category banners, and Spyderstild logo as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Create a new ProductCategorySection for PC builds showcasing two pre-built systems: a gaming PC (9.3GB) and a hacking PC (12.8GB)
Add PC builds data to frontend/src/data/products.ts with gaming PC (9.3GB) and hacking PC (12.8GB) specifications
Update HomePage component to render PC builds section with red neon accent color below the monitors section
Update Header navigation to include PC Builds link that scrolls to the new PC builds section
Update Footer navigation to include PC Builds category link

new_feature_requests.summary: Create gaming PC showcase website with product displays
Design bold, futuristic visual theme for gaming brand
Add product categories for mice, keyboards, and monitors
Add PC builds section with gaming PC (9.3GB) and hacking PC (12.8GB)
